product_name: Boardworks Joy Ride Flow Stan Up Paddle Board - 9' 11"
long_description: A joy to paddle on flat, placid lakes, this beautifully crafted board has a large deck pad and a wide, stable design that's perfect for the yoga enthusiast looking to take to the water.
short_description: A joy to paddle on flat, placid lakes, this beautifully crafted board has a large deck pad and a wide, stable design that's perfect for the yoga enthusiast looking to take to the water.
